steps.value: 2-year experienced JavaScript developer with AWS experience

title: Select Skills and Set Difficulty Level

steps.value: How do you handle AWS errors?

title: View candidate responses
steps: Click on a candidate's response to view their video interview and structured answers
Verify that the candidate's score, resume, and video recording are displayed
expected_result: The candidate's response is displayed with their score, resume, and video recording

title: View detailed scoring
steps: Navigate to the interview screenings section
Click on a candidate's interview to view their AI-analyzed scores
Verify that the AI provides a comprehensive summary of the interview, including observations, positives, and negatives
expected_result: The detailed scoring page displays the AI's analysis of the candidate's interview

title: Take action on a candidate
steps: Verify that an action button is displayed to either select or reject the candidate
expected_result: The action button is displayed, allowing the user to select or reject the candidate

title: Screen resumes against a job description
steps: Create an interview and upload a set of resumes
Verify that the AI commences the screening process
Verify that each resume is assigned a score based on the candidate's skills and experience
expected_result: The AI screens the resumes and assigns a score to each, indicating the candidate's suitability for the job

title: View AI recommendations
steps: Navigate to the resume screening results
Verify that the AI provides a recommendation for each candidate, indicating whether they are suitable for the next stage
expected_result: The AI recommendations are displayed, indicating whether each candidate is suitable for the next stage

title: Send interview link to candidate
steps: Select a candidate to advance to the next round
Verify that an interview link is sent to the candidate, valid for 24 hours
Verify that the candidate can submit their interview at their convenience
expected_result: The interview link is sent to the candidate, allowing them to submit their interview
